statements: SELECT * FROM amenities_inventory;
SELECT amenity_name, quantity FROM amenities_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT amenity_id, amenity_name FROM amenities_inventory ORDER BY amenity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM amenities_inventory WHERE quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT amenity_id, amenity_name, quantity FROM amenities_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM amenities_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, amenity_name ASC;
SELECT amenity_name, quantity, restock_threshold FROM amenities_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT amenity_id, amenity_name, quantity FROM amenities_inventory WHERE restock_threshold < 5 ORDER BY amenity_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT amenity_name FROM amenities_inventory;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT quantity) AS unique_quantities FROM amenities_inventory;
SELECT * FROM amenities;
SELECT name, quantity FROM amenities WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name, restock_date FROM amenities ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY restock_date DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM amenities ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT name, restock_date FROM amenities WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY restock_date ASC
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE name LIKE '%pool%'
SELECT * FROM towels ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT id, color, quantity FROM towels WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT name, type FROM spa_products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, category FROM toiletries WHERE category = 'shampoo';
SELECT * FROM towels JOIN toiletries ON towels.id = toiletries.id;
SELECT id, color, quantity FROM towels WHERE color = 'Blue' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM toiletries WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM spa_products WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY id ASC, type DESC;
SELECT * FROM towels JOIN toiletries ON towels.id = toiletries.id WHERE towels.color = 'White' AND toiletries.category = 'Shampoo';
SELECT id, name, color FROM towels INNER JOIN spa_products ON towels.id = spa_products.id WHERE towels.quantity >= 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM towels;
SELECT id,color,size,stock_quantity FROM toiletries WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT name,brand FROM spa_products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id,restock_date,quantity_restocked FROM restocking_logs WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT id,name,type,stock_quantity FROM spa_products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM towels WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT id, color, size FROM towels WHERE color = 'Blue' AND size = 'Medium';
SELECT name, brand, stock_quantity FROM toiletries WHERE brand = 'Dove' ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT type, stock_quantity FROM spa_products WHERE type IN ('Essential Oil', 'Lotion') ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM restocking_logs WHERE restock_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY quantity_restocked DESC;
SELECT * FROM amenities;
SELECT amenity_name, stock_quantity FROM amenities ORDER BY amenity_name DESC;
SELECT towel_id, towel_color, available_quantity FROM towels WHERE available_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, brand_name, price FROM spa_products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price;
SELECT restock_date, restocked_by, quantity_restocked FROM restocking_log ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM amenities;
SELECT amenity_id, amenity_name, stock_quantity FROM amenities WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY amenity_name DESC;
SELECT toiletry_id, product_name, brand_name, quantity_in_stock FROM toiletries WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT towel_color, towel_size, available_quantity FROM towels WHERE towel_color = 'Blue' OR towel_color = 'Green' ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM spa_products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 OR available_quantity > 20 ORDER BY price ASC, available_quantity DESC;
